title: Soldier's Tale
description:
Concert Poster Design.

L'Histoire du soldat (The Soldier's Tale) by Igor Stravinsky. This poster is designed to capture the mood of the theatrical work about a soldier, devil and violin, as well as advertise an orchestra concert where the piece would be played.

Process: Sketched six concepts for client, and created multiple variations of the final poster for feedback. Created a Facebook Cover version of the poster for event invites.
